Studies indicate that coal use may decline substantially in the US and Europe over
the coming decade based on the increasing competitiveness of low
. In several developing economies, the relative youth
fired electricity fleet will make a complete phaseout before 2050 difficult

major Asian economies. Some studies suggest that coal may continue to be a part of the Chinese energy

. Others indicate that a strategic transition would decrease the

. This would entail prioritizing earlier retirements of plants based on technical (efficiency),
